posts.title: Petrol, diesel prices today: Rates constant on 19 November, check here what you need to pay in your city
posts.desc: Petrol and diesel prices on 19 November 2021: Petrol price in Delhi stands at Rs 103.97 per litre while diesel is available for Rs 86.67. In Mumbai, petrol is retailing at Rs 109.98 while diesel costs Rs 94.14

posts.title: Market Roundup: Sensex falls by 372 points, Nifty ends at 17,764; check top winners and losers here
posts.desc: The domestic market indices BSE Sensex and NSE Nifty 50 ended in red on Thursday, 18 November. While Sensex fell by 372.32 points to 59,636.01, Nifty declined to 17,764.80, with a loss 133.85 points.

posts.title: Sapphire Foods: Shares debut on stock market at Rs 1,360; all you need to know
posts.desc: On the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), the stock listed at Rs 1,360.75 apiece and on the National Stock Exchange, the opening price was Rs 1,368 per share against the issue price of Rs 1,180

posts.title: Are You Ready To Be Let In On A Secret?
posts.desc: Soak Up with Stars invites you, our viewers to get an exclusive, in-depth look into the lives of Bollywood’s favourite celebrities.

posts.title: Petrol and diesel prices remain stable; check what you need to pay in your city here
posts.desc: The price of fuel fluctuates depending on the incidence of local taxes and the cost of transportation from state to state.

posts.title: Cryptocurrency update: Bitcoin, Ether and other other cryptos witness rise in value
posts.desc: Both bitcoin and Ether have risen in value amidst speculative demand for digital assets as well as the argument that digital tokens can be a hedge against inflation risks.

posts.title: Gold price today: 10 grams of gold reaches Rs 49,480, silver sold at Rs 66,300 per kg
posts.desc: Gold Price Today: In Mumbai, 10 grams of 22-carat gold is being purchased at Rs 48,480. While for the same quantity in the national capital, 22-carat gold is being traded at Rs 48,240.

posts.title: Paytm's parent company One97 Communications to make stock market debut today; all you need to know
posts.desc: Investors are anticipating a muted listing for the payments company after its Initial Public Offering (IPO) received a lukewarm response.

posts.title: From Paytm to Nykaa IPO Listing, here's everything you need to know about Initial Public Offerings
posts.desc: IPOs help enterprises and startups to improve and expand their business and also lends more credibility to the company as it is under scrutiny

posts.title: Market Roundup: Sensex slips by 314 points, Nifty ends at 17,898; today's top winners and losers
posts.desc: The top gainers of BSE Sensex were Maruti, Asian Paints, Power Grid, NTPC and ITC. The top losers were Axis Bank. Reliance, Kotak Bank, Bharti Airtel and Titan

posts.title: Go Fashion IPO opens today at price band of Rs 655 to Rs 690; here's everything you need to know

posts.title: Fitch retains India's sovereign rating, says risks to medium-term growth 'narrowing'
posts.desc: Mobility indicators have returned to pre-pandemic levels and high-frequency indicators point to strength in the manufacturing sector, it said

posts.title: Rakesh Jhunjhunwala-backed Akasa Air inks $9 billion order with Boeing for 72 jets
posts.desc: Akasa was co-founded by Jhunjhunwala and former Jet Airways CEO Vinay Dube. Former Indigo president Aditya Ghosh is also on board of the airline

posts.title: Economic recovery taking hold, private investment should resume, says Shaktikanta Das
posts.desc: Lauding tech entrepreneurs, the RBI governor said the country has emerged as a top performer in the startup landscape, attracting billions of foreign capital
